definition: acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Today acrylic is widely applied to many fields.
sentences.chinese: 如今亚克力被广泛应用到很多领域。

sentences.english: Wheather lampholder needs to be made of PMMA?
sentences.chinese: 灯头是否需要使用亚克力的？

sentences.english: The jacket shall be round 16-gauge galvanized steel with acrylic enamel finish.
sentences.chinese: 外壳应该是圆形16级电镀钢，外覆亚克力珐琅表面。

sentences.english: I want the knob at the end of the string to be tinted acrylic to match with the lampshade .
sentences.chinese: 我要绳尾的圆形按扭也是有亚克力与灯罩相配。

sentences.english: Optical ball with acrylic cover, good transparency, no deformation.
sentences.chinese: 采用亚克力光学球罩，透光性好，无变形。

sentences.english: The acrylic knife rack shown here costs about $70.
sentences.chinese: 上图中的亚克力刀架大约70美元左右。

sentences.english: Silver standoffs, composite metal with a stainless steel finish, and acrylic lettering.
sentences.chinese: 银的压铆螺母柱，不锈钢的复合金属，还有亚克力字。

sentences.english: Medium bodied, fast-setting, high strength acrylic cement.
sentences.chinese: 中等粘稠度，快速干化，高强度亚克力胶粘剂。
采用无缩变亚克力光学透镜。

definition: texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
acetal resin/Delrin/unplasticized polyvinyl chloride (uPVC or rigid PVC)
